meanings.definition: Not causing or involving any loss
meanings.sent1: The lossless plan ensured that nothing valuable would be lost.
meanings.sent2: The company implemented a lossless strategy to prevent any damage.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to have a lossless experience without any setbacks.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a lossless file, preserving every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The lossless solution was so effective that no harm could come to it.

meanings.definition: Capable of preserving all data or quality without any degradation
meanings.sent1: The lossless compression technology maintained the image quality.
meanings.sent2: The lossless audio format ensured the music sounded just as good.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was like a lossless transfer of objects.
meanings.sent4: His love was a lossless connection, never fading or weakening.
meanings.sent5: The lossless preservation of the artifact made it look brand new.
